title: Veggie bulgur salad
ingredients: ['140g bulgur', '250ml boiling water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 large tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 cucumber, diced', '2 green peppers, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, finely chopped', '7 spring onions, finely chopped', '30g minced fresh parsley', '15g minced fresh mint leaves', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes, or to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'juice of 1 fresh lemon', '2 tablespoons pomegranate molasses or balsamic vinegar']
